mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL( CONCAT(SUBSTR(B.NEW_ENT_ID, 1, 11), LPAD( (SUBSTR(B.NEW_ENT_ID, 12, 5)) + 1 , 5, '0')) , CONCAT('ENT', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '00001') ) AS NEW_ENT_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(A.ENT_ID) AS NEW_ENT_ID FROM ENT1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.ENT_ID LIKE CONCAT('ENT', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), '%') ) B
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CHECK_CNT FROM ENT1000 WHERE 1=1 AND ENT_CRN = #{entCrn} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CHECK_CNT FROM ENT1100 WHERE 1=1 AND USR_ID = #{usrId} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT ID ,PW ,NM ,ENT_ID ,ENT_NM ,AUTH_CD FROM login_view A WHERE 1=1 AND ID = #{usrId} AND PW = #{pw} AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND TYPE = '01'

WHERE 1=1 AND ID = #{usrId} AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND TYPE = '01'
